Plot: A young man tries to deal with the childhood terror that has affected his life.
Title: Boogeyman
Writer: Eric Kripke (story), Eric Kripke (screenplay), Juliet Snowden (screenplay), Stiles White (screenplay)
Actors: Barry Watson, Emily Deschanel, Skye McCole Bartusiak, Tory Mussett
tomatoConsensus: The plot is been-there done-that generic, and none of the shock effects can do anything to build up suspense.
